title: Successful New Product Development Strategies Through Strategic Alliances

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental business management and marketing concepts
context.additional_context: Understanding strategic alliances and new product development processes applicable in practice.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of consistency in strategic alliance activities (scanning, coordination, learning) on new product success.
Learners can propose strategies for applying flexible NPD decision-making in response to market environment changes (competitive intensity, market volatility).
Learners can develop internal process improvement strategies to enhance the innovativeness of product programs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
